snippet.title: Sonic Movie 3 Skin & Level Reveal For Sonic X Shadow Generations From the State of Play
snippet.description: This is recorded straight off the State of Play stream, so the quality is limited. Hopefully Sony or SEGA will release this standalone soon. But until then, here's this!
